dcterms:creator: Paul Bergmann
Michael Fauser
David Sattlegger
Carsten Steger
dcterms:description: The MVTecAD dataset includes 5,354 images of ten industrial objects and five textures, with 3,629 normal and 1,725 test images, including 1,258 anomaly images. It provides image-level and pixel-level annotations.
dcterms:title: MVTecAD

dcterms:creator: Pankaj Mishra
Riccardo Verk
Daniele Fornasier
Claudio Piciarelli
Gian Luca Foresti
dcterms:description: The BTAD dataset has 2,830 images in three classes of different resolutions. Each class includes normal and anomaly images, including scratch or distortion defect types.
dcterms:title: BTAD

dcterms:creator: Jakob Božič
Domen Tabernik
Danijel Skočaj
dcterms:description: The KSDD2 dataset developed with images of defective production items, contains 356 defective and 2,979 normal images.
dcterms:title: KSDD2

dcterms:creator: Junliang Wang
Chuqiao Xu
Zhengliang Yang
Jie Zhang
Xiaoou Li
dcterms:description: The MixedWM38 dataset is a mixed-type wafermap defect dataset that includes real and synthetic patterns. It contains 1 normal pattern, 8 basic single defect patterns, and 29 mixed defect patterns.
dcterms:title: MixedWM38

dcterms:description: The Industrial Dataset was constructed from various open-source datasets and comprises 30 categories, including 15 object categories and 15 texture categories, totaling 17,393 images. All images in this dataset are normal.
dcterms:title: Industrial Dataset
